title: The Past, Present and Future of Cigar Events - The After Show
itunes:title: The Past, Present and Future of Cigar Events - The After Show
description:
Terence Reilly from Aganorsa Leaf joins us on The After Show to talk about cigar events. Where are we at now and how do things look for the future?

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at https://www.2GuysCigars.com/.
